title: Poll rolls shrink by 1.7 crore (8%) in 9 states/UTs under SIR Phase 2
description: Nine states in Phase 2 of the special intensive revision (SIR) have seen their combined electorate drop by 7.9% to 19.7 crore. Over 1.7 crore electors were removed, with Andaman & Nicobar and Gujarat experiencing the steepest declines. Three states are yet to publish their final rolls.

In a heartwarming moment, Hrithik Roshan endorsed Kapoor's performance, labeling him the 'BEST' in the romantic genre.

title: Bride's pet dog sparks violent clash in UP, wedding cancelled
description: A wedding in Fatehpur turned violent after a pet dog's barking led to a brawl between the bride's and groom's families. The disturbance during rituals escalated when the groom's side allegedly attacked the animal, resulting in a physical fight. At least five people were injured, and the ceremony was called off. No formal complaint has been lodged yet.

title: A kernel of truth
description: Legend would have us believe that English colonists were first introduced to popcorn on February 22, 1630. While historians are now more or less certain that that story is more myth than truth, there’s no denying that native Americans have had popcorn for thousands of years. Grab your popcorn as A.S.Ganesh lets you in on certain kernels of truth…
